summary: Page 59 (book page 79) captures continuation of section צב, then sections צג through צז. Several structural issues: the continuation of צב is typed as a section with null number instead of continuation_fragment. Two sections (צה, צז) have missing source_refs. Garbled text 'בחיק חקר' appears in both צה and צו.

issues.location: first item - continuation of section צב
issues.description: The first item on this page is a continuation of section צב from page 58. The OCR has it as type 'section' with number null and title 'ענינים גשמיים הוא עושה לשם שמים'. This should be type 'continuation_fragment' since it continues the previous page's section צב.
Section צה has source_ref: null. The image appears to show a source reference after the makor text. This needs to be extracted from the image.
issues.corrected_text: Verify and add source_ref from image

issues.description: Section צז has source_ref: null. This section continues to the next page, so the source ref likely appears there. This is expected for a continues_to situation.
issues.corrected_text: Source ref expected on next page (continues)

issues.description: OCR has 'אמנם בחיק חקר משתמש בהנאת עוה"ז לכבוד התוה"ק ית"ק' - the phrase 'בחיק חקר' is garbled OCR and does not match the image. Needs verification.
Same garbled text: 'אמנם בחיק חקר משתמש בהנאת עוח"ז' - 'בחיק חקר' is wrong AND 'עוח"ז' should be 'עוה"ז'.
OCR has 'ואוכל ה' [?] במאכל ומשתה' with uncertainty marker. The unclear word needs verification.
OCR has 'להרים אלו גשמיים המה' - 'להרים' does not seem right in context. Image may show different wording.
